theorem.name: or_absorbtion

text.english: \(\texttt{true}\) is the absorbing element of \(\vee\): \[ \forall b \in Bool.\; \texttt{true} \vee b = \texttt{true} \]
text.italiano: \(\texttt{true}\) Ã¨ l'elemento assorbente di \(\vee\): \[ \forall b \in Bool.\; \texttt{true} \vee b = \texttt{true} \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem or_absorbtion : forall b : Bool , true || b = true.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
